channel.title: Vitis Pseudoreticulata on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Vitis Pseudoreticulata on funPlantGenes

item.title: VpPUB24
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: VpPUB24 Gene Name: putative U-box protein 24 Genome: Species: Vitis pseudoreticulata Functional Descriptions: VpPUB24, a novel gene from Chinese grapevine, Vitis pseudoreticulata, targets VpICE1 to enhance cold tolerance.

item.title: VpRFP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: VpRFP1 Gene Name: C4C4-type RING finger protein Genome: Species: Vitis pseudoreticulata Functional Descriptions: VpRFP1, a novel C4C4-type RING finger protein gene from Chinese wild Vitis pseudoreticulata, functions as a transcriptional activator in defence response of grapevine.
